snippet: The Las Vegas billionaire has also reportedly decided to scale back other Republican giving as he directs support to the presumptive Republican presidential nominee.
abstract: Sheldon G Adelson tells Donald Trump, in private meeting, that he intends to contribute sum of money to help Trump get elected that could amount to over $100 million; Adelson also plans to redirect focus of his campaign contributions away from congressional Republicans and towards efforts to boost Trump's chances in presidential election.
lead_paragraph: The Las Vegas billionaire has also reportedly decided to scale back other Republican giving as he directs support to the presumptive Republican presidential nominee.

headline.main: Sheldon Adelson Is Poised to Give Donald Trump a Donation Boost
headline.print_headline: Casino Magnate Is Poised to Bolster Trump’s Bid
